name: Sudoku Express
description:
The classic Sudoku game at its best for iOS! A version for those who just want to solve the puzzles.

Ad-free and no in-app purchases for an uninterrupted gaming experience.

A minimalist, flat UI design and easy noting allow you to focus on the point of the game, which is solving the puzzles! Multiple color schemes and font selections allow you to customize the experience to your preferences.

With 1,001 unique puzzles each for the included Easy, Medium and Hard puzzles, you will be challenged for hours, days and weeks.
